::Eclipse::

    He awoke with a start, not really remembering the night's =
events. Getting up to all fours he sniffed around the area.
    "What? Why =
am I sniffing?" He asked himself. Then he looked at himself. "What am I?"
 =
   He then saw what made him this way, the slice of the Golden Disk. He dec=
ided to try and find out more about his abilities.
    Concentrating he sto=
od up. "Impressive, very impressive."
    He was on his hind legs, which ha=
d a humanoid shape to them, but also a wolf shape to them. He had hands, an=
d a tail. Finally he realized what his Beast Mode is. A werewolf. He is abl=
e to walk, or run on all fours, and the same on his hind legs. "Maximize."
=
    His robot mode was somewhat plain, he didn't really like it. "Beast Mod=
e, much better."
    He really liked his beast mode, it was so elegant. Now=
 he had to find the Maximals. He headed off on all fours sniffing for the M=
aximals smell.

(He looks like Noble, only without the spikes and he has a =
tail.)
